definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: The hairdresser opens a salon, the lawyer his or her own practice and so on.
sentences.chinese: 理发师开一间发型屋，律师重操旧业，等等。

sentences.english: There is this good ol' barber in some city in US.
sentences.chinese: 在美国某城，有个善良的老理发师。

sentences.english: Have the stylist dry your hair completely.
sentences.chinese: 让理发师把你的头发完全吹干。

sentences.english: This hairdresser designs this elegant and graceful hair-style.
sentences.chinese: 这种典雅大方的发式出自这位理发师之手。

sentences.english: The hairdresser is drying his hair with the hairdryer.
sentences.chinese: 理发师在用吹风机给自己吹干头发。

sentences.english: From my point of view, he got everything it entails to become a tiptop barber.
sentences.chinese: 我想他有那种一流理发师所应具备的一切素质。
“那还用说，”理发师斩钉截铁地说。

sentences.english: Please hold still, or the barber might cut your ear.
sentences.chinese: 请不要动，不然理发师可能割掉你的耳朵。

sentences.english: The barber thinned out my thick hair.
sentences.chinese: 理发师把我浓密的头发削薄了一些。

sentences.english: "How did the Emperor ride, sir?" said the barber.
sentences.chinese: “先生，”那理发师说，“皇上骑马的本领高明吧？”

sentences.english: Ask the hairdresser for a wash and blow-dry.
sentences.chinese: 要求理发师洗头并吹干定型。

sentences.english: We have the same barber, but not much else in common.
sentences.chinese: 我们有相同的理发师，但再无其他共同点。

sentences.english: He pounced on Sweeney, and quickly persuaded Depp to join him.
sentences.chinese: 他抓住《理发师陶德》，并很快说服戴普加入他。

sentences.english: My hair is getting too long. It's time to hit the hairdresser.
sentences.chinese: 我的头发太长了，该找理发师剪剪了。

definition: to have a haircut/to cut sb's hair
hairdressing/to give sb's hair a cut or other beauty treatment/beautiful hair
